description: Try our easy to follow Cos, Radish & Bean Salad With Chive & Buttermilk Dressing recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Cos, Radish & Bean Salad With Chive & Buttermilk Dressing
name: Cos, Radish & Bean Salad With Chive & Buttermilk Dressing Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 1 tbs Macro Fire apple cider vinegar

recipeInstructions.text: To serve, drain all vegetables well and pat dry with a clean towel. Arrange in a bowl. Drizzle over dressing and season to taste.
